category.name: Administration.Access Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_use_strict_program_project_hierarchy
preference.preference_description:
Enables strict hierarchical representation of programs and projects where a program can have projects. Valid values are: * true: Users can only select programs in the user session. The program selected in user session and the projects under that program will be displayed for project assignment * false: All programs and projects are available for selection in the user session. All programs and projects are displayed for project assignment. This is the default value.
Note: It is recommended that data assigned to programs and projects be migrated to hierarchical configuration before setting this preference to true.
